There is a tolerant and peaceful side to their character. Such people are never afraid to allow others their freedom of expression; they do not want to cause arguments and if there is any way to avoid arguing, they will probably take this option. However, they are not weak and if the situation forces them to fight these people will rise to the occasion, whether it is to defend themselves or those close to them.<ref>http://www.gotohoroscope.com/chinese-zodiac-pig.html</ref>
There is a tolerant and peaceful side to their character. Such people are never afraid to allow others their freedom of expression; they do not want to cause arguments and if there is any way to avoid arguing, they will probably take this option. However, they are not weak and if the situation forces them to fight these people will rise to the occasion, whether it is to defend themselves or those close to them.<ref>http://www.gotohoroscope.com/chinese-zodiac-pig.html</ref>
â   â
One of the few faults of the pig is their refusal to listen to others advice. They make great friends and will listen to you, but when you try to offer any suggestions for them, they will find any way around using them. These people will find something wrong with anyone's advice. Sometimes it almost seems like they want to fail.
